description:
Attempting to launch the app (Ubuntu 20.10) results in the following output:

ERROR: ld.so: object 'libgtk3-nocsd.so.0' from LD_PRELOAD cannot be preloaded (failed to map segment from shared object): ignored.
Failed to register: GDBus.Error:org.freedesktop.DBus.Error.AccessDenied: Connection ":1.127" is not allowed to own the service "online.xournal.mobile" due to AppArmor policy
It appears to be something I like to have but I couldn launch it in Ubuntu 20.04.2 LTS
This is the best onenote alternative for linux!

App looks nice and was on the top pick list so I wanted to try it as it had bad ratings. Anyhow I have had several issues when installing apps through Ubuntu Store 20.04.. I have found I can search/install many apps along like this one through the system terminal.. Just run "sudo apt-get install xxx" where xxx is the package name, in this case it is 'Xournal++'. The app does install the proper triggers/links and can be launched via the app browser then )

it says it is installed and able to remove, but where is even the application that I just installed! It is not in gnome menu nor search? No Icon to launch. Developer pushes the app to the snap store but did not even try one time to check everything ok. It is easy to publish an app , but even is it virus, spyware, malware! I dont know, I cant draw anything because no icon to launch. And you can wait more and more to linux goes mainstream, it can't even let you install any app on.

i install it using this command 

Stable PPA

sudo add-apt-repository ppa:apandada1/xournalpp-stable
sudo apt update
sudo apt install xournalpp

Unstable PPA

sudo add-apt-repository ppa:andreasbutti/xournalpp-master
sudo apt update
sudo apt install xournalpp
No icon , not launching. In Ubuntu21.04. I remove it
No worky. Should come with a warning "Not made for Ubuntu 20.04.5 LTS".
I've downloaded it on Ubuntu 20.10, but after download i couldn't find it anywhere and did not know how to start the program. Deinstalled it, as there is no use so far...

Je pense que sa peut être une bonne application, juste quelque point negatif et je comprends l'application es en beta sur android, déjà on ne peut pas ouvrir de pdf donc la gros point négatif, et surtout on ne peut pas écrire avec son clavier
